name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Premier Suite - Sea-View
info:Stayed in May 2023
info:Family
info:2 Reviews
rating:1.7
posted:Posted May 29, 2023
msg:Complaint Regarding My Stay at Mandarin Oriental Hotel Sanya

I am writing to express my deep disappointment and dissatisfaction with my recent stay at the Mandarin Oriental Hotel in Sanya. As a loyal customer and someone who had been looking forward to this post-Covid family trip, I must say that my experience fell far below the expectations I had for your esteemed establishment. The series of incidents I encountered during my stay has left a lasting negative impression.

Firstly, upon checking into my room, I discovered that the bath salt had been used, indicating a lack of attention to detail in the room's preparation. This immediately made me question the overall cleanliness and hygiene standards of the hotel.

Secondly, I was appalled when my mother was almost hit by a golf cart while we were moving around in the hotel. The incident left us shaken and concerned for our safety. It is absolutely unacceptable that such a dangerous situation could occur within the hotel grounds, which should be a secure and protected environment for guests.

Furthermore, I must address the lack of professionalism displayed by the manager on duty who approached me to apologize for the used bath salt. Not only did the manager fail to address the issue promptly, but they also referred to me by the wrong name, which demonstrated a disregard for customer service and basic attentiveness. This level of carelessness only served to exacerbate my disappointment.

Even worse, when I reported my grievances of the bath salt to the hotel staff, they sent me two unwrapped cakes that appeared to be in a sorry state. The cakes were clearly an afterthought and lacked the quality and presentation one would expect from a renowned hotel such as Mandarin Oriental. This gesture not only failed to rectify the previous issues but also displayed a lack of consideration and effort.

Additionally, the behavior of the concierge staff was highly unprofessional. Throughout my stay, they consistently neglected to greet to guests and instead indulged in playing with their phones. This type of behavior creates an unwelcoming and impersonal atmosphere, which is a stark contrast to the exceptional service one would expect from your establishment.

Lastly, the incompetence of the butler assigned to my room was evident in their inability to navigate the hotel mini program on WeChat. Despite my repeated requests, the butler continuously sent me the wrong links, resulting in my inability to order food through the designated platform. Also, I asked the butler to book your spa hotel for me on my arrival in your hotel but did not get any response during my 3 days stay. This level of ineptitude further exemplifies the lack of proper training provided to the staff members.

My family and I had been eagerly anticipating this trip, hoping to create cherished memories. Instead, our experience at the Mandarin Oriental Hotel Sanya was marred by a string of disappointments and subpar service. The incidents I have outlined make me question the internal staff training and overall commitment to providing a superior guest experience.

I trust that as a reputable establishment, Mandarin Oriental Hotel Sanya will take immediate action to address these issues. I kindly request a thorough investigation into the matters raised and appropriate measures be implemented to ensure such incidents do not recur. Furthermore, I expect a sincere apology and a gesture of goodwill to compensate for the inconvenience and disappointment caused during my stay.
----------------------------------------

name:B‚Äçr‚Äçu‚Äçm‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçJ‚Äçu‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçe
info:Superior Room - Garden-View (Double Bed)
info:Stayed in September 2021
info:Couples
info:2 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted October 4, 2021
msg:The Mandarin Oriental is conveniently located 40 min from the airport in Yalong Bay. The hotel is quite big, but the infrastructure is really well done, so even if the occupancy rate is high, you don't feel bothered by the crowd. All the staff was going above and beyond the deliver a flawless service (rare in Sanya!). The food is really good, probably the best breakfast buffet we have tried in Sanya if we compare it to other hotels. The Chinese restaurant, Sunset Bar, and the seaside restaurant Fresh were equally great. Fresh is a bit overpriced for what it is (tomato + mozzarella 180RMB when it is a small portion is really overpriced). The rooms are a bit old but very clean and big. Probably our favourite hotel in Sanya for now. 
----------------------------------------

posted:Posted May 19, 2024
msg:When I first came to Sanya, I chose Mandarin Oriental, and it was a good choice. It was a good start, which made me feel good about Sanya and wanted to come to Mandarin Oriental again. I didn't know much about it at first, and I was a little disappointed when I saw that the bay was small, but I was slapped in the face immediately, because although it was small, it was exquisite, just as the Internet said, it was full of essences, with clear water and fine sand, coconut trees and shadows, no filters, and it was especially beautiful under the sun.
I lived in the Xishuiwentao room, which had an exclusive small pool in the yard, and the noodle bar was very close to the water swing. Mia, the little housekeeper, was very friendly and polite. When she learned that we were on a honeymoon trip, rose cakes and love cards were all prepared in place, and the air conditioner in the room was also disinfected in advance. As soon as I entered the door, it was fragrant and cool. When I opened the curtains, the shadows of the trees were dancing, and facing the sea, the spring flowers were blooming, and my whole body and mind were particularly relaxed. Little Mia knew that I had a cold and I prepared ginger soup. It was so considerate. The room was comfortable, and the pillows and quilts were soft and skin-friendly. I completely stretched out and fell into a deep sleep. I have certain requirements for sleep quality, and I got it easily here. I was so happy and energetic to enjoy the hotel's special seafood buffet, which was also surprisingly good, with unlimited lobster, foie gras, beef, lamb, durian, pineapple, etc. Food, beautiful scenery, and lover by my side üë´ Really feel warm and romantic ‚ô™(^‚àá^*)~~ Having said so much, I still have to praise the staff in the end. They are all in good spirits, polite, friendly and enthusiastic. They will take the initiative to ask the tenants walking on the road, which is a plus. At the same time, I was impressed by the lady who received me at the front desk with a high ponytail, beautiful makeup, and a powerful and magnetic voice. I didn't see the work card but was very confident, friendly and polite. There was also a chef with a short hair and sunny foie gras stall at the seafood dinner. He had a good understanding of food. The fried foie gras was cooked to the right temperature and was fragrant and soft. I don't like foie gras, but I ate 4 pieces in a panic. He also took the initiative to share with the chef next door how to check the heat. It's good to love sharing. Of course, there is also Mia, the customer service who did not show up throughout the whole process. She is also polite and friendly, and has a good sense of propriety. She always thinks of my needs when I am about to find her and arranges them in advance. Thank you very much üôè The overall feeling is that a good hotel meets good employees. The staff are very passionate about life and have an attitude, so they unconsciously show confidence at work, and are especially friendly and polite. For this spirit, I will still visit Mandarin again. It turns out that there is a reason why my family always comes. It is really good.

In short, this trip is a correct choice, and I will choose here next time

msg:A wonderful trip always leaves people wanting more. This time I came to Sanya for a beach vacation, and I chose the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, wanting to enjoy a luxurious, private and quiet vacation time. Here, I deeply experienced what a real holiday paradise is.
First of all, the Mandarin Oriental Hotel is located in the Coral Bay Military Management Area, which is quiet, private and isolated from the world. Even in the bustling city of Sanya, it seems to be in a paradise.
Secondly, the hotel is extremely private, with only a small number of guest rooms, so that each guest has sufficient private space. Every plant, tree, stone and scene in the hotel has been carefully designed, making people feel the elegance and elegance of the East.
Finally, I must mention the hotel's catering services. The restaurant of the Mandarin Oriental Hotel offers a variety of cuisines, from international buffets to authentic oriental cuisine, and every dish is memorable.
In short, I highly recommend that you come to Sanya for a beach vacation and choose the Mandarin Oriental Hotel to spend a luxurious, private and unforgettable vacation here.

posted:Posted February 2, 2024
msg:The goodness of Mandarin Oriental must be savored after you check in. You will live in a leisurely, beautiful and comfortable living a**osphere, and you will feel comfortable being nourished by the sea at close range every day. After staying here for a week, I have fallen deeply in love with it~

At first, you will feel that it is a little different from other hotels. The facilities are relatively old and Chinese-style. The wooden furniture requires strength to move. You need to look for things many times to find them, which is consistent with daily habits. Not quite the same.

However, when I was lying in the yard and watching the coconut trees swaying, I saw the sea in front of me, and everything else was just floating clouds. The distance between this room and the sea is very suitable. It will not be disturbed by the waves, it will not be too humid, and you can feel the sea up close. The site selection and design of Xishui Wentao Pavilion is really amazing! Suitable for everyone who loves the sea~

I have tried every dining place, and the scenery is beautiful. The sunset at the barbecue buffet is the most panoramic. The overall design style of Western food will be more stylish than the barbecue place. The noodle bar is the place where I eat the most. It‚Äôs less crowded, quieter and more leisurely. It‚Äôs the best place to watch the changing weather and sailing on the sea.

As for the food itself, the service of Western food is very good, but the food is average. One is that I don't like the taste, and the ingredients are not particularly outstanding. The BBQ is the most popular, really rich and worth trying. The noodle bar has the best taste. The noodles in the afternoon are delicious and the small hot pot in the evening is also very special.

There is no problem with the service of the big hotel, but when there are too many people, it is inevitable that the phone calls will not be connected and will be slower. The service provided by the front desk manager Alex was very good. At that time, the butler assigned to me did not respond, so he became my personal butler. He responded to all my requests and was very professional. Thank you very much.

The happiest thing was the free follow-up photo shoot with Platinum. I met a super professional and super cute photographer. He was very professional, interesting, and very good at guiding me. He knew how to explore my beauty, help me relax, and interact with the beautiful scenery, which made me Even those who have difficulty taking photos have taken beautiful photos~ I forgot to ask his name, he is a senior photographer~

The Phoenix tree is a very beautiful existence. If you have time, you must go to the grassland to experience this beautiful existence~

All in all, it was a great trip~

You have to wait for a long time for breakfast, and it is within 5 minutes at other times. Butler Chen was very attentive in his service. Travel photography is more expensive than other hotels, and the lighting for the free photos is very poor and hard to choose from, but the photographer is really good, and there are all kinds of free clothes to choose from, so those who are willing to spend money can take a good photo.

Breakfast tastes much better than Shangri-La MGM. Freshly squeezed juice replaces water every morning. I love it.

posted:Posted January 13, 2024
msg:The worst MO I have ever stayed in. As a fan of Shang Fan Hui, this hotel is really disappointing. I fell in love with Mandarin Oriental because I once stayed at Fan Hotel in Wangfujing, Beijing. If my first time staying at Fan Hotel was in Sanya, I believe I won't have a good impression of this brand. It doesn't matter that the rooms are old. After all, it has been open for a long time. The public areas are very beautifully designed. However, the quality of the hotel does not match the Mandarin Oriental. It looks like a cheap guest house. The room does not even have the most basic capsule coffee machine that should be equipped in a luxury hotel, and the minibar is extremely basic. The hardware is not updated, the facilities are not maintained, and the hotel is dilapidated everywhere. This may not be the case if the decoration is old but the hardware is regularly updated and maintained on a small scale. The hair dryer equipped in the room is very cheap. It feels like an old hair dryer from more than ten years ago. The mattress is on the hard side. I think the most speechless thing is that as the world's top luxury hotel brand, it actually made a funny operation of limited two bottles of Evian with unlimited Nongfu Spring, which really lowers the level of the fan. If you're afraid of high costs, you won't be given high-end mineral water, and you might as well just use normal mineral water as standard. The standard drinking water in other Mandarin Oriental hotels in China that I have stayed at is either one pure glass bottle mineral water from New Zealand, or high-end glass bottle mineral water such as NORDAQ. Moreover, the drinking water provided by most luxury hotels in China is a series of high-quality mineral water such as Tibet Glacier 5100 and Bama Platinum Spring. In short, the standard drinking water in luxury hotels is not lower than the standard of mineral water. The configuration of this hotel feels out of touch with the standards of Mandarin Oriental and even luxury hotels. This is the first time I have seen a luxury hotel that does not come with mineral water as standard in the rooms. I didn't seem to find room service in the room. I don't know if I didn't see it or if it wasn't there at all. If not, it was really bad. The room also felt dirty everywhere, and there wasn't even a mouthwash in the supplies. The toiletries used are French Olon, which is favored by Mandarin Oriental and Four Seasons. There is still a hint of Mandarin Oriental. The hotel service is also average. Guests were not asked if they wanted coffee or tea during breakfast. This is the most basic service standard for a luxury hotel breakfast, and the variety is not very rich. The beach buffet in the evening costs 798 per person. I feel that the service and quality are not worth the price. The turndown service was also seriously out of line with Mandarin Oriental standards. They didn't know how to hang or fold the clothes. They didn't know how to place a cup on the bedside. There were no slippers next to them. They just spread sheets and left the dirty places. Still dirty. But I have to say that the guy who picked me up by the hotel's battery car was pretty nice, warm and thoughtful. The housekeeper is also good. All in all, the hardware, equipment maintenance, service, configuration, and quality of this hotel have nothing to do with the words Mandarin Oriental. It is a miracle that such a bad hotel has not been withdrawn. If I hadn‚Äôt found the hotel, the fan-shaped logo at the door, and the #I am a fan slogan in the work area on the official website of Shang Fan Hui, I would have thought that I was visiting a Four Points by Sheraton hotel that has been open for a very long time. This hotel feels like listing Wyndham Howard Johnson is not too much... It is indeed a bit excessive to compare it with the Mandarin Oriental Wangfujing in Beijing, the Asia-Pacific flagship store, but at least it cannot be inferior to the standard of a luxury hotel. The price of the Mandarin Oriental in Sanya is 2,000+, which is in no way comparable to the Mandarin Oriental in Guangzhou, where the usual house price is less than 2,000!

I was very enthusiastic and truly managed the butler service.
The rooms and common areas are great. After passing a section of seaside road, we entered the private space of Yiwanyi Hotel. The front desk staff greeted us warmly, and the shuttle bus man introduced us to the distribution of the entire park in detail. The room is in the Southeast Asian solid wood style, and all the copper metal accessories show a calm a**osphere. The 1.35-meter wide bed is very comfortable to sleep on. The bed is decorated with flowers with welcome words, and the Evian mineral water in the glass bottle is more classy. Outside the window are large lawns, banana trees, the sea and distant mountains. The multiple heated swimming pools are beautiful, and the staff changes towels promptly and provides free swimming rings. Haijiaoxuan, the sea swing and the English letters on the grass are beautiful places to take photos. It is so pleasant to sit on a deck chair by the seaside and watch the red sunset at 5 o'clock every evening.
The breakfast, seafood noodles at Yiyang Chinese Restaurant and Noodle Bar are all very delicious.
The guys who connected the battery cars were very nice. When we passed by, they would say hello and ask us if we wanted to use the car. It was also very convenient to call for a car on the phone. We arrived at the door in a few minutes. Once when it was raining, the shuttle bus boy took the initiative to ask us to get on the bus and take shelter from the rain.
Generally speaking, the hotel's service and scenery exceeded expectations. The old man was very happy and the scenery was beautiful with few people. Special thanks to housekeeper Amy.
Problems such as the indifferent shuttle bus, lack of housekeeping service, and damp quilts in the room that were mentioned in previous reviews did not occur. The only drawback is that the hair dryer really needs to be upgraded. It would be even better if it could be converted into a smart toilet.

It's a pity that it's not the highest floor, and the view is a little blocked, but there is no check-out upstairs, so there is nothing we can do. There were very few people in the swimming pool, and the temperature in Sanya had cooled down. We wore thickened diving suits that we bought specially for Double Eleven. We shivered when we got into the water. It stopped being cold after a while, but the temperature of the pool was still around 26 degrees at 2 o'clock in the afternoon. Regardless of the cold water, ultraviolet rays will burn your hands two shades darker, so pay attention to sun protection. At 4:30 every evening, I would stroll through the hotel and the various mountain roads and trails. It was very similar to the French resort Pimalai I stayed at when I was on vacation in Koh Lanta, Thailand. The difference was that the rooms in Pimalai were larger and newer. Maybe Wenhua's rooms are a little simple and small, but this unique location will make people forget the existence of time. The first night we had a buffet, in the second row by the beach, the food was sweet and the service was good. On the second night, I ate in the business district and was not very satisfied. I went back to the hotel pub and ordered more fries, which finally made me full. The night before leaving, I asked Amy to book a reservation at Haijiao Xuan. The cool breeze was blowing and the waves were lapping against the rocks. The definition of romance finally had a concrete image. In general, the hotel's service and scenery exceeded expectations. The price of more than 2,000 was due to the off-season. After three years of not leaving Shanghai, this hotel feels like a great value. Of course, the consumption level in Sanya is indeed high, and it has isolated many people, but there must be a time of luxury in life, and it must be spent in worthwhile places. Mandarin Oriental is worthy of all my dreams in the past few years, and it is a bit more than expected. Thanks to the hotel for its good taste and giving us a dream,
Thank you also to the housekeeper Amy for being responsive.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr

posted:Posted December 8, 2023
msg:Three-Night Cultural Oriental Tour
It's perfect for my kind of hotel-style travel. During my three-day stay, I hardly left the hotel except for late-night snacks.
Serve:
The person who received us this time was Mia. Who is so lucky to have such a good housekeeper? It's me. Everything I asked for was answered, as if I was a spoiled baby. They were afraid that we would have trouble moving our things, so they applied for us to extend our stay in the original house. Don‚Äôt take too much care when decorating the room by yourself. From handwritten cards to shaped balloons to small cakes, it‚Äôs hard for most boyfriends to do it, haha. There is also a small necklace that I miss so much. A good butler can really add a lot of points to the hotel's impression. As a guest, you can feel Mia's sincere trea**ent and her continued care after check-out. I hope the company can add chicken drumsticks to her haha. I hope I can get a small fan when I have the chance.

FOOD:
A hearty brunch in the morning, including Wagyu rice noodles and lobster wontons every day. Half of the bread will be updated, but you have to eat the hot buttered bread every day. The fruit was very fresh and sweet, and I realized how good the food I had eaten at other hotels before checking in was. But the watermelon grade is a bit average. Other cold meals are basically the same every day.
In the evening, we had a western dinner for two at Haijiaoxuan as the sun set. Who's to say it's not delicious? More than 1,300 people don't have this view in Beijing, not to mention that every dish was perfect. The seafood platter, from lobster to grilled skewers, is firm and fresh. According to the waiter, it is better than the buffet seafood next to it. Anyway, I am very satisfied with the taste. The sunset was especially beautiful that day, and it was the best seaside dinner experience I had. However, if you want to use 100 US dollars, you need to pay a service fee.
Public area:
I swam in the swimming pool every day. The relaxing environment allowed me to learn how to do a small dive while sitting. There are shade trees next to the infinity pool, which is also great for swimming during the day. But there were a lot of floating objects in the other swimming pool with trails and pavilions, so I didn‚Äôt swim in it.
The structure of the hotel is very suitable for walking. Half the time, we didn't call a battery car and chose to explore the forest trails on our own legs. Three days is just enough, not boring.
Among the Sanya Scenic Hotel, Mandarin ranks first, and it is far ahead. One step at a time, the entire glass sea in Coral Bay was really beautiful in the morning. I picked up a lot of beautiful corals and small shells while walking. However, be aware that the sand is a bit harsh on your feet.
Activity:
I was lucky enough to catch the annual Chris**as lighting ceremony, and the a**osphere was no less than the highlight of my last Chris**as watching the drone show in Gubei Water Town. The sudden spray of bubbles and colorful pieces all over the sky is really romantic. The wonderful performance made me forget to take two bites of the cake haha.
Rooms:
The Guanhai Pavilion where I stayed made it possible to watch the sunset in the room. I was mentally prepared before coming. As for the age of the room, it is actually well maintained and the taste of the hotel can still be seen. Except for some things that really need improvement, like the old toilet and no exhaust fan. But I like this small bungalow very much. It feels more like a vacation than the guest rooms in a large building.
Travel photography:
The hotel sent 5 photos and a short video of the Earl's trip. Before I went, I promised that there would be no extra charge. However, the photographer, Director Hong, is so awesome. He can adjust the a**osphere and find the best angle for me. He keeps telling me, a lady, to smile a little bit when I am laughing. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs luck or the configuration is different, but my subsequent travel photos in other hotels were not as good as this one.
Among the top luxury and five-star hotels in Sanya, I really like the Mandarin Oriental the most, and I have become a little fan since then. I hope to add some projects outside the hotel, because as a Beijing native, I rarely have the opportunity to go to the Mandarin Oriental in Beijing, but I also want to experience other activities.

name:f‚Äçl‚Äço‚Äçw‚Äçe‚Äçr‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äça
info:Guestroom - Sea-View (Pool)
info:Stayed in December 2023
info:Family
info:5 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted December 10, 2023
msg:Before choosing MO, I had been researching for a long time. For a family of three like me with a child under two years old who simply went to hotels, and it was also a period when various epidemic viruses were prevalent, I finally chose MO. The main reason is that MO is not a popular family hotel, so it avoids the crowds; its public area is really suitable for vacation. However, I saw a lot of comments on Xiaohongshu about the hotel's old facilities and unsatisfactory service. I was a little worried before checking in. But from the moment I arrived at the hotel, I felt like those reviews didn't tell the whole story. (This review is a bit long, but it is a true experience)
1. Regarding check-in efficiency and front desk service quality
I called the MO front desk at 12 o'clock on the day of check-in to ask if the room was ready. After all, I brought three large suitcases and naughty and clingy children. If I arrived at the hotel early and couldn't check in, it would affect my mood. Moreover, Wanda Ruihua's housekeeper applied for a late check-out for me. If MO's room was not ready yet, I would continue to rest and wait in Ruihua. But what I didn't expect was that my room was ready for occupancy, so my husband and I quickly set off with our children and three boxes of luggage.
As soon as the taxi arrived at the hotel and stopped, a smiling staff member opened the door, helped us with our luggage, and guided us to the front desk to check in. When checking in, since the hotel we stayed in before had not checked out for us (it should be the check-in system of the Ministry of Public Security), face recognition could not be entered. Even though I contacted the Wanda Reign housekeeper to urge it, the second time Still no success. The front desk staff may have noticed my anxiety, so they asked us to check in first and then come back when we were free. Then, we successfully got the room card and were ready to take the shuttle bus back to the room. The whole process took less than ten minutes. By the way, we were also assigned a housekeeper, Amy, which was quite surprising because I had heard that only villas have housekeepers. In the following days, thanks to Amy, the holiday became relaxed and enjoyable. While waiting for the shuttle bus, I also received a welcome necklace (with a ü™≠ shell).
2. About room facilities, equipment and supplies
I actually checked in on December 6th and checked out on the 9th. Among them, Ctrip couldn't book it on the 6th, so I booked it from the official website for one day, and the price was the same. Originally, we wanted to book 0113 this time because it was the last room, so it would be relatively quiet and undisturbed. Unfortunately, there were already guests in the room on the day of check-in, so they arranged 0110 for us. It turned out to be very good and excellent. The view and pavilion are perfect for lying in a daze for a day ~
Although the hotel is a bit old, the facilities and equipment in the room are well maintained, clean and tidy, and there are no sanitary blind spots (the child's toy car was driven under the bed, and when I went to pick it up, I found that the bottom of the bed was also spotless). Cribs and children's toiletries are also specially prepared. The red panda slippers are so cute~
I've seen reviews before that the hotel's soundproofing is poor, but I stayed there for 3 nights and was not disturbed by any noise from next door. The children are put to bed at 20 o'clock every day, and everything goes smoothly. Of course, I did occasionally hear faint voices next door, but I wouldn't say I was disturbed.
Room cleaning and turndown service are provided daily. The drinks in the mini bar are also rich and varied, including Coke, Sprite sparkling water, beer and bean juice, Wong Lo Kat, and of course, a large bottle of Evian. It is replenished every day. Except for mineral water (because it needs to be soaked in milk), there is no way to finish the other drinks. The room staff was worried that we wouldn't have enough, so they specially prepared two extra large bottles of Nongfu Spring for us to soak in milk.
3. Hotel dining and entertainment
Regarding dining and the breakfast buffet, we went there around 10 o'clock. There was basically no need to wait for a table. There were also child seats and tableware, so there were no special surprises.
You can choose takeout for meals at other times, but you need to pick it up from the takeout box in the lobby. You can also dine at the on-site restaurant. The Internet celebrity check-in spot "Haijiao Xuan" is really lively, so we just took a look, after all, the children are not used to Western food. So I chose a Chinese restaurant facing the ocean, where you can also see the sunset from the window position. Surprisingly, Yiyang also has a children's menu, but the selection is limited. It‚Äôs really hard to comment too much on the food, it‚Äôs just average, but the service is still very good.
After breakfast, I took the children to the recreation center to play. Very limited children‚Äôs play space, 50 square meters or 80 square meters? But after all, MO is not a family hotel, so it doesn‚Äôt matter.
The free Bojue travel photography provided by the hotel was also very good, so I couldn‚Äôt bear to pack it all in the end.
4. About hotel services
From the front desk to the concierge, and from the guest rooms to the restaurants, I felt all the warmth. To put it more specifically, the front desk maintained a gentle tone and patience in response to my inquiries; the concierge was very proactive in helping me with my luggage throughout the process, and even borrowed a stroller during the process. I said that they would contact me to replace the new trolley once it was returned; the housekeeping depar**ent cleaned the room and replenished the fruit every day, and even came to ask if there was a need for more supplies, and also replenished us with minerals for making milk. water; the children's swimming ring we brought floated to 0113 overnight, and the staff responsible for salvaging floating objects from the swimming pool also enthusiastically helped us bring it back; the service staff in the restaurant were also very gentle to the children, which I am very grateful for. The most important thing is our housekeeper Amy, who is responsible for our daily life. If we have any needs, she will help. She applied for a late check-out on the day of check-out, so that the children can sleep comfortably and happily. Went to check out. When checking out (the child broke a cup), Amy also gave me a little squirrel (actually this is my dream souvenir, because I have already caused a lot of trouble for Amy, so I didn't have the nerve to ask for it directly).
By the way, we were lucky enough to meet a newlywed couple's wedding on the day of check-in, and the wedding was decorated on the day of check-out. It was really festive.
The overall evaluation is that it is beyond expectations and is a comfortable and worry-free vacation mode.

posted:Posted October 30, 2023
msg:Overall, it is a resort hotel with almost no shortcomings.
The Mandarin Oriental Hotel is located in Coral Bay. It is the only hotel in the Bay Area. The coastal path in front of the hotel entrance is also very beautiful. It is a restricted area, so the hotel is very quiet and there are no helicopters buzzing around. It is very suitable for a quiet vacation.
The hotel's swimming pool is very beautiful with pavilions and green plants, and there is a slide to increase the playability. However, when you go swimming, you will find that there are still some fallen leaves and floating dust in the swimming pool.
Walking from the lobby to the seaside, you will pass by the seaside buffet restaurant, Haijiaoxuan is in the corner. Under the setting sun, the dinner tables and chairs are arranged in an orderly manner on the ground of green grass and stone bricks. The fountains and coconut trees blocked the setting sun and turned into gray silhouettes. The scenery of the seaside makes people feel emotionally stable. Walking along the seaside to the hotel, the layout of check-in points along the way is very natural, even better than the photos. There are no areas in the hotel that you have to pay to enter, so you won't feel disconnected when you stay and play.
There are many stone statues in the hotel. They look very Southeast Asian. They are not strange or normal, but they always attract attention. The breakfast is not very rich, but the freshly prepared ones are delicious.
In addition, the service is also very good. From door greeting to check-in, battery car pick-up and drop-off are all professional and efficient. However, the butler service is required when checking in. It seems that they will not be contacted in advance. Thank you to the butler Chen Chuan for your service.

As for the noodle bar, it‚Äôs a pity that there is no supply of sour rice noodles. The other items are still of high quality, which is very suitable to satisfy your hunger while playing. Bowl; there are quite a lot of breakfast categories, and I didn‚Äôt feel tired after eating it for a week. The lobster wontons are very good; the food at Sunset Bar is quite satisfactory, and the drinks this time refreshed my understanding: the combination of coriander + spicy millet It was really sour and refreshing. The only thing that I felt was a little bit wrong was the coconuts in the hotel, which were not very tasty. Anyway, I ordered a total of 8 coconuts for takeout in the end. I don‚Äôt know if it has something to do with the off-peak travel, and you‚Äôll be notified by phone when the bus is approaching, so you don‚Äôt have to go out and wait. It is so relaxing to swim and enjoy the sea breeze. The lifeguards are very good at laying out blankets and towels.
Let‚Äôs talk about the room type. The room is indeed not big or new, and I feel like I don‚Äôt want to sit on the sofa. Haha, I will lay my own sheets for everything. There is a seal on the toilet door which will cause a loud noise when the door is opened at night. The accompanying picture shows the balcony views of three types of Sea Breeze Pavilion rooms, each with its own advantages and disadvantages. In the end, I chose to walk down to the first floor by the seaside. It is very close to the lobby restaurant and swimming pool. I can‚Äôt see it in the photo, but the first glance when I got there was amazing. Disadvantages: The room feels dark. It doesn't feel safe to sleep with the window open at night because it is on the first floor. If you close the balcony door and draw the curtains, the room will be a bit stuffy. But if you are bringing a baby, this room is very suitable because it is close and there are many steps in Wenhua, so there is no need for a stroller at all. In addition, because the hotel is well greened, there are still mosquitoes, so be careful to prevent mosquitoes.

Although many reviews said that the hotel was old, so my expectations were not high, but the result was unexpectedly satisfyingüòÄ

Everywhere is a scenery. It‚Äôs really nice to be able to maintain this experience after so many years. The sun was shining when we left. Come back next time to enjoy the scenery you missed!
Hygiene: Although the facilities are relatively old, they are very clean. On the first day after the typhoon passed, the leaves and sand in the public areas have been cleaned up, and the rooms are also neat and tidy.
Facilities: The only shortcoming, especially the hair dryer, has been worn out and is seriously inconsistent with the hotel's positioning.
Service: The staff are very nice. They will say hello when they meet on the road. The battery car comes quickly. The butler July responds in a timely manner.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Superior Room - Garden-View (Double Bed)
info:Stayed in August 2023

info:2 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted August 8, 2023
msg:I chose a hotel for a long time before booking. Seeing the mixed reviews of Mandarin Oriental, I was quite worried. The actual check-in experience is pretty good.
The hotel has its own beach, which is very private. In August, there are fewer people in the hotel except for breakfast time. The water is very blue and there are many corals on the beach. Watching the sunset by the coconut tree is also ok. It's a pity that the net red swing has been blown off recently.
There are several areas in the swimming pool. There are beach chairs by the sea where you can lie down and watch the sea at any time, and there are lifeguards guarding the water. There are 24-hour battery cars to help with transportation. But walking from the beach actually doesn't take long to get back to the room.
The rooms are all 2-story villas, and Jade Garden is on the first floor. There are no bugs, very clean, and the rooms are quite large. The toiletries are from Oulong. Two bottles of Evian glass bottles of water a day. The room is very air-conditioned, and it is very cool when you come back from the outside üòÇ The basic online reviews are not thunderous.
Hotel staff are also friendly. Thanks to the butler Grace, I contacted you in advance before check-in, and the communication during the check-in was very timely and smooth~ Since the last day of Bojue's trip was in the afternoon, I also helped to communicate as much as possible to delay check-out. very nice~
The receptionist at the entrance of the hotel lobby is also very friendly and will help open the door and take luggage. The deposit refund after check-out is also very fast. Maybe there are fewer people in August.
What may be inconvenient is that takeaway can only be delivered to the door of the hotel, and you need to pick it up yourself. Breakfast is from 7 to 11 o'clock. After 10 o'clock, you have to queue for about 20 minutes.
There is a big pineapple shopping mall more than 2 kilometers around, where you can do simple shopping. It is also very convenient to take a taxi from the hotel.
Overall it is quite recommended.

name:z‚Äçh‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçy‚Äçi‚Äçy‚Äçu‚Äç2‚Äç9‚Äç2‚Äç8
info:Premier Room - Sea-View (2 beds)
info:Stayed in August 2023
info:Family
info:14 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted September 4, 2023
msg:I specially selected the Mandarin Oriental in Coral Bay, Sanya, Hainan, for a staggered vacation at the end of August. During the three-year epidemic, the most popular restaurant in Shanghai was Mandarin Oriental. Their service concept is quite good, and the design is more Southeast Asian and island-style. This time, Wenhua in Hainan has put a lot of effort into the design of one bay and one mountain. It was opened in 2009. Although the year is already old, the garden of the entire hotel is more mature. The roads are basically surrounded by green trees covering the sky, from high plantains and coconut trees to medium-height frangipani flowers. , Terminalia trees, birds of paradise and other flowers are dotted among them. Even if you don‚Äôt take the shuttle bus, you can feel the refreshment brought by the plants while strolling along the mountain road.
One day before check-in, Mr. Chen Chuan, the caring butler, contacted us in advance to understand our floor preferences and help us prepare the room. Afraid of the impact of the three typhoons, he also asked about the weather conditions. Mr. Chen responded quickly one by one. He felt very comfortable with the step-by-step service before he checked in. The car is parked on the third floor of the hotel, and the staff will guide you to the hotel lobby on the second floor. Since the guest room has not been cleaned, the family has a short rest in the sunset bar. The housekeeper, Mr. Chen, sent us the room card. Tong also expedited the check-in speed for us. After receiving the notice that you can check in, take the shuttle bus to help deliver the room.
The 5th floor of the 2 buildings we stayed in, the bathrooms are on the left and right when you open the door, you can directly see the balcony and sea view. The curtain and door next to the bathtub can be closed, and children are not afraid of being cold in the bath. The bath water is very large, very comfortable, and there are all kinds of toiletries. There are also slippers, toiletries, and bathrobes for children. It is so cute to swim in a bathrobe. Two double beds of 1.35 meters, no pressure to sleep with the baby. The drinks in the refrigerator will be replenished every day. There are also two large bottles of Evian mineral water in sufficient supply. Of course, you can also choose Nongfu mountain spring water. On the third day of our stay, we don‚Äôt know whether the neighbors upstairs or next door left the takeaway and instant noodles at our door, and the swill inside flowed out. We saw the sewage flowing across the house early when we went out, so we informed the housekeeper, Mr. Chen, as soon as possible. , help solve it quickly. After we got back from breakfast, the door was cleared. Every time Mr. Chen's service is in place, including the drop-off, he did not receive a confirmation message, which is also troublesome for Mr. Chen. Wenhua's butler service is really responsive, and we must give it a thumbs up.
Due to the vacation with the baby, we didn't go anywhere for four days and three nights, and ate in restaurants. There are many kinds of food in the breakfast pavilion, such as lobster, noodles, fruits, all kinds of freshly squeezed, coffee, bread, hot and cold dishes, which can fully satisfy the children's eating habits; lunch noodles, grouper seafood noodles are so fresh They all fall down; the barbecue buffet in the waterside pavilion for dinner, the tomahawk steak in Haijiaoxuan, each restaurant has its own characteristics.
Just sitting on the beach for a while and watching the waves roll, from dark blue to light blue in the distance, to almost transparent with a little bit of blue, and finally to the milky white of the coast; I can't see the layers of waves rushing forward and backward The waves hit the waves and bounced back at the connection between the sea and the shore, taking away part of the sand and stones, exposing the white coral stones and scallops; the small crabs that occasionally climbed out quickly walked on the beach, seeming to be in a hurry. Every day we take a leisurely walk in the garden, blowing the sea breeze, looking at the distant sea, watching the lights of the lighthouse alternate, and observing every ebb and flow of the tide.
The river and the sky were completely dustless, and there was only a solitary moon in the bright sky. No rush, no attractions, just enjoy this slow time with family and cubs. The moon has not yet set, and there is a reflection of the moonlight on the sea surface, sparkling on the sea surface, the world has become very quiet, only the sound of the waves can be heard~~~

Note that the reason for the upgrade was to give my children more space to move around. But I came here to play on the beach. You didn't tell me in advance that you didn't have the room I booked, and you didn't tell me at the front desk that you didn't have it. You don‚Äôt have to do this if you extend your stay normally, right? You didn't give me the room I booked. The ticket price is high. The sunset and sunset glow in the evening are so beautiful. You can catch the sea every night. If you have any questions, you will be there in time Feedback was resolved, there was a small problem during check-in, and the supervisor was also enthusiastic to help solve it. His attitude was so good that every driver of the battery car who passed by would also take the initiative to say hello. In short, the 4-day experience was very good, and I will come for vacation in the future

msg:The hotel exclusively enjoys Coral Bay. It is located in the military management area, with good privacy. There is a duty-free product experience store on the second floor of the hotel. You can purchase products by swiping the mini program and inputting the flight number to send them home. It is very convenient. Entertainment includes double sailing, snorkeling, slide paddling pool and outdoor swimming pool with infinity sea view, recreational game room and fitness room. The beach water of the hotel is relatively clear, but there are many coral fragments on the beach, which is a bit thorny. The overall design of the room facilities is good, but the space It's a bit small, and the wireless direct charger on the bedside table can only charge Apple phones, not Huawei's. It's a pity that the lighting in front of the full-length mirror and the mirror in the washstand is insufficient or the lighting effect is not good.
Services: Front desk, telephone main station, battery car pick-up, room cleaning, catering, recreation and spa services are all very good, especially the butler Jingran Kiki has a very good service attitude and can help solve problems encountered in a timely manner. Waterside buffet breakfast restaurant Meng Ting's service is warm and thoughtful, very professional, thank you.
Meals: The lobster, durian and foie gras buffet is very good, Sunset BAR and Yiyang Chinese Restaurant are also good
Spa: Compared with the Mandarin Oriental Spa in Taikoo Hui, Guangzhou, it is slightly inferior, but the overall experience is still good

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Premier Room - Sea-View (2 beds)
info:Stayed in August 2023
info:Family
info:16 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted August 14, 2023
msg:It can be regarded as an old-fashioned luxury hotel in Sanya. Considering that this trip is for an old mother to bring her baby alone, she doesn‚Äôt want to go to an overcrowded parent-child hotel, so she chose a small fan with Jingmei and snorkeling in the hotel. But after arriving, I found that there was a lot of people checking in. When I arrived that day, it was after 2 o'clock in the afternoon. I completed the check-in procedures first, and the room was still not cleaned until 3 o'clock. Checked in for me for 3 nights, let me talk about some feelings comprehensively:
Although it is not a parent-child hotel, there is also a parent-child activity room, but there are few things, and it is not very playable for children over 6 years old. The activity room carpet looks very old, and there is a musty smell in the space. People who are allergic to mites are advised not to go. My family only went there once to pass the time while waiting for the room. I put a mask on the child the whole time, and I took the child away after staying for half an hour.
The swimming pool has relatively less traffic, the water quality looks clean, and there is a circulation device. Every day, the staff are seen salvaging floating objects, and children must go there every day. Next to it is a children's pool with sand, which is very shallow. I don't know if this is because there is sand in it, it doesn't look very clean. In terms of details, both the swimming pool and the hot spring provide drinking water by the pool for guests, which is more humane. There are also public sunscreens and sprays provided in the hot springs.
The buffet dinner in the water pavilion is free for children under 1.2 meters. It is the most cost-effective place in this place where the per capita consumption is high. The food variety is also very rich. However, it is not recommended for people who are afraid of heat. The seaside scenery is really beautiful, and the heat is really hot. Eat while eating Khan, the meal starts at 6:30, one big and one small. At 7:30, take pictures and get back to the room after eating.
The housekeeper, Sally, added V one day in advance, and the service attitude and efficiency during the stay were very good and fast. Because of the musty smell in the room (later I learned that it seems that old hotels along the coast have this phenomenon), the guest room was notified to take lily flowers for physical deodorization. Including some other living needs and scheduled itineraries, sister Sally can arrange it for us immediately. On the last day, because the child was still in the swimming pool, it was too late to check out, and we applied for a one-hour delay. Before leaving, the children were very happy with the check-out gift.
It is a pity that the spa was not available on this trip. On the one hand, the spa coupons given are limited and must be fully charged for a single item to be deducted, which is a bit dishonest. I bring my baby alone and want to participate in the parent-child spa together. The total number of items for the two of us must exceed a thousand, but it just doesn‚Äôt work. There are manicure programs for children, but the spa staff suggested that children get a massage during the consultation, which means just applying nail polish, and the staff are better at massage. Can the tasteless project of children's nail art be removed from the project?
Finally, it is inconvenient to take out food. Food cannot be delivered to the room. If there are many people traveling, people can be allocated, so we can only order expensive food to be delivered to the room.
The snorkeling project was not experienced due to natural reasons such as the water level during the stay, but this is completely understandable, and water entertainment should be carried out based on safety.

If you want to really experience Sanya mo from the room, you must book from the Haizitou room. After watching a lot of videos, the room will be upgraded in the off-season, but the Dragon Boat Festival is too hot, and all the Haizitou rooms in mo are booked. This time, I booked the Sea Breeze Pavilion one month in advance. I chose a room with a good view, opened the curtains, and faced the sea. I could hear the sound of the waves even when I was sleeping. Even if I lay on the balcony all day, I didn‚Äôt feel bored. Wentao Pavilion downstairs is more convenient, and you can walk to the beach in a minute, but I prefer Haifeng Pavilion, which can take into account privacy and landscape.
After staying for three nights, every turn-down will surprise me with diptyque body lotion and sunflower hair clips. Butler service can arrange everything, battery car spa and water sports, just let me know on WeChat. The battery cars will say hello when they pass by, and the other staff are also responsive. The most popular buffet and Haijiao Restaurant must be ordered in advance by calling. It is a pity that I didn‚Äôt eat it this time.
I was given a surprise when I left the store. In order to make up for the regret of not collecting the room card when I went to Pudong mo, I asked in the lobby on the third floor if I could take the room card as a souvenir when I checked out, and immediately picked a new one. My room card was given to me, as well as mo little squirrel doll and ballpoint pen. While waiting for the bus, I also asked where to buy Sanya MO‚Äôs folding fan. The duty manager, Ms. Kiki, knew that I was a fan and went to get Sanya MO‚Äôs goldfish folding fan for me. Fortunately, I didn‚Äôt get on the bus soon. Thank you again Miss Kiki!
There are many top luxury hotels in Sanya, but if I go to Sanya for vacation again, mo is still my first choice.

2) I made an appoin**ent for the hotel's sea fishing and snorkeling experience ü§ø I didn't expect sea fishing to be so interesting! ! This is how I started a new hobbyü•∞Before going to sea, the coach will carefully inquire about personal physical condition and safety instructions, and teach us the fishing operation method in detail after boarding the boat. Summary of experience, for beginners, one is to try their luck, and the other is to slowly practice the hand feeling. In addition, due to the influence of natural factors such as warm currents and tides in the sea, the size of the fish mouth is also different. After playing for two days in a row, I finally caught 1 üêü, this trip was worth it! ! (Haha, if I experienced this project earlier, I might have to soak in the sea the whole time I entered the store üòÇ)
I'm not good at snorkeling. . I was a little scared, I was shivered by the fish, and my nervous knee hit the rock üò≠ woo woo

4) There is also a Chinese restaurant to boast about! When going out, I still miss the traditional dishes after eating too much local specialties. Except for the taste of mulberry leaf vegetables, I can't accept it. The taste of other meals is very online, which satisfies my homely stomach

Let me talk about some areas for improvement:
1) Diarrhea continued after the first breakfast, and I didn‚Äôt feel better until I left the store. I took medicine and suppressed it all the way. I don't know if there is a collision of food attributes, or if the food is not clean, the weather is hot and there are a lot of flying insects, so I have to find a way to keep it fresh.
2) The garden-view room of Cuiyuanxuan I stayed in this time is located on the first floor, and the room cannot be exposed to the sun, so it will be extremely humid and cold. However, this room type should be very comfortable and cool in midsummer. Friends who choose a room can pay attention.

Zora, the housekeeper who stayed this time, was very serious and responsible, and provided timely and effective communication services throughout the whole processüëçüèª

Overall, I am very satisfied with this trip! ! Vacation mode is fully relaxed and happy! !

posted:Posted March 3, 2023
msg:Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Sanya on the tip of your tongue
Vacation in Sanya, only delicious food and beautiful scenery can not live up to it!
In the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Sanya, there is a kind of invincible sea view called backing the mountain and facing the sea to be comfortable and leisurely, and there is a kind of gluttony called enjoying the time from the lips and teeth to the heart. The Mandarin Oriental on the tip of your tongue, the seafood buffet where you can watch the sunset with the sea breeze, the convenient noodle bar...
One-to-one service from hotel butlers
The service quality is very good. When we checked in, Alex chose the best one-bedroom sea view double room in Sea Breeze Pavilion for us. The check-in procedure was simple and efficient, and we highly praised it.
Special thanks to Ms. Jessica, the hotel steward of our trip. She is very nice, beautiful, and thoughtful. The hotel's activities are very well introduced. She helped us book restaurants and various other items when the time was tight. , A few times I asked questions at night, and I could reply in time and arrange them in an orderly manner. If you are on vacation, you must choose this place. I look forward to seeing you next time.
hotel environment
Because the hotel is under the military management of Dadonghai, it is extremely quiet. Whether it is day or night, the hotel has a quiet, lazy, and peaceful feeling. Especially suitable for couples or family vacations. Because the hotel is in Dadonghai, there are many delicious food nearby.
Hotel food:
Chinese restaurant, western restaurant, barbecue, bar, lobby bar, and all-day meal delivery service are still very enjoyable.
Haijiaoxuan, it is recommended to come at sunset in the evening. It provides seafood dishes. You can watch the sunset while eating by the sea. It is a super romantic date.
room design
The room types of the hotel adopt an open space design, allowing the sea breeze and sunlight to enter the room naturally. The all-wooden structure is decorated with a little plant, which is full of island style, and the sea is just outside the door.
Highlights:
One sea, one bay, one hotel, enjoying private beaches and stretching coastlines. Built in a hot garden, the room density is low, and the room is close to the sea. Take the crystal boat floating sponge, the breeze is blowing, and you can still enjoy the hotel beach with the infinity pool facing the sea. It is highly recommended.

It feels super comfortable to watch the scenery from the balcony~üå¥üå¥üå¥
	
After packing up, go to the beach üåä and walk around, then go to the noodle bar to eat noodles üçú (about 200 per person), and a 15% tip is required [Á¨ëÂì≠R] (see picture 13 for the scenery). The dinner at Haijiaoxuan in the evening is also very beautiful, but it is a pity that it needs to be booked half a month in advance (700‚ûï per person).
	
Next, I will share my real feelings about staying hereüå¥
	
‚≠ïÔ∏èAdvantages:
1. The hotel has a private beach, and there are not many people, which meets the needs of sisters to take pictures at will, and is very suitable for couples to stay.
2. The housekeeper will contact me via WeChat one day in advance to understand the check-in needs, and provided a crib and a stroller üë∂üèª according to my requirements.
3. The hotel provides turndown service at night.
4. The refrigerator and water bar in the room are all free. The buffet tastes good.
	
‚ùå Disadvantages:
1. Check-in at the front desk is slow, I hope this can be improved in the future. Later, when I wanted to change the room, a male service staff at the front desk only said that ‚ûï400 can be changed to a double room, and did not inform that there are other options, but another female service staff said that ‚ûï200 can be changed to a twin room. I don't understand why this low-priced option was missed, and I urged me to let the customers in the future choose first. The service attitude is obviously not as comfortable as Pullman hotels! ! ! The service of the hotel really affects the mood of the holiday! ! !
2. It is understandable that many people complain about the slowness of the battery car, because the hotel is still quite big, and it is not so easy to have several electric cars to meet the needs of all the guests in the hotel. I believe the hotel has done its best. But to be honest, it is really troublesome to take an electric car everywhere, it is not as convenient as walking.
3. There is only one children's playground, and there are no other parent-child activities, so it is not suitable for bringing children.
4. I stayed at the Pullman Sanya Bay Ocean Residence the day before, and the service there is relatively more enthusiastic than the service staff here.
5. The sea next to the hotel belongs to the protected area, so there are many stones on the beach. If you want to feel the feeling of stepping on fine sand, or if your baby wants to dig sand, this place is really not suitable. My daughter likes to play with sand [crying R][crying R][crying R]
6. I saw someone complaining about the old room, but I personally think it‚Äôs okay, as long as it‚Äôs clean.
	
‚úÖFinally, the scenery is good, but next time you bring your baby, you should not come here, and you will choose a hotel with more parent-child activities.

posted:Posted December 23, 2022
msg:It is very correct to choose Mandarin Oriental in Sanya this year. I think people who understand life must understand the goodness of MO. Bill Bensley's sustainable design concept allows people to have the opportunity to integrate with nature, surrounded by green trees, there are seven or eight trees growing freely around a seaside rocking chairüå¥üå≥, and the phoenix flower tree in the town store, the image extremely beautiful.

Walking to the water pavilion in the morning, the staff will say "good morning" in a friendly manner, enjoy a rich breakfast in a pleasant a**osphere, go for a walk on the beach after the end, bring a book to enjoy in the sunshine ‚òÄÔ∏è, next to the waves üåä, and live in the world for a long time The tired body and mind can be cleared up and calmed down in one morning.

The lunch in the noodle bar and the Chinese restaurant each have their own characteristics, but the waiter‚Äôs kindness remains unchanged. When I was eating at the Chinese restaurant, I asked if the coconut meat in the coconut rice was edible, and warmly brought me a small bowl of coconut meat. I ate it while eating. Imagine it gathers energy and grows day and night by the sea.

This time, the body and mind were not in the best condition, so I couldn't overcome the fear of snorkeling in the sea, but thanks to the coach and housekeeper Jessie for their patience and guidance, the signs to protect the coral were also very impressive. Whether it is a cloudy or sunny afternoon, Coral Bay has its own beauty, with dark clouds above the head, waves of waves in front of the eyes, and mountains in the distance lying on their sides and sleeping. At that moment, people seem to be finally connected with heaven and earth. If I have to say regret, it is that the boundary of the scenery is clearly visible, and I wonder if there is a more magnificent place.

During the seaside barbecue, Brother Lobster kept telling everyone in line that there were many more, all of them, and the scene was hilarious. The dinner at Haijiaoxuan is indeed a highlight moment, no filter is needed, and the changing sky and dusk can't be enough to take pictures, it is extremely beautiful. The hotel boy from Switzerland is probably a dedicated and professional manager who pays attention to everything and does it himself, which is impressive. He said that he has been in China for four years.

The turndown service was very good. One day when I returned to the room, there was a card on the wooden tray, asking us about the type of pillow we are more used to, and the silk interlining under the cosmetics. The waiter was reluctant to mention these details.

Before I came here, I saw some sayings about the old hotel rooms. After I moved in, my personal feeling is that I love such a simple and natural style, throwing away all unnecessary complexity, leaving logs, fabrics and artworks to the end, which is infinitely close Life is true. When I woke up in the morning, the trees and the blue sky came into view outside the window, and the beginning of the day was very good. The stone carvings of the hotel also have the color of ancient civilization and modern mischievous design, with different expressions and movements. With the garden design, it can make people slow down and return to their hearts. If I want to write a long-planned novel, I will definitely choose to live here for a long time, get along with myself, and let nature breed inspiration.

Special thanks to Jessie, the housekeeper, who made reservations for seaside dining, shuttle bus, and warm reminders every day. She is professional and friendly. The shuttle bus service inside the hotel is also very convenient, and the waiters who drive are very polite.

Suggestion: The front desk can prepare some small bottles of drinking water for guests to carry when they go out.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr

rating:4.7
posted:Posted December 15, 2022
msg:I am very grateful to Mandarin Oriental for providing me with such an excellent experience on my first stop in Sanya.
As a veteran luxury hotel opened in 2009, Mandarin Oriental did not give me any bad feelings because of its "oldness". The picturesque scenery and the warm and considerate service made me ignore some shortcomings in the details. The hotel has a strong sense of design. The Southeast Asian-style garden design, excellent swimming pool view, and ultra-low room density all give me a strong sense of exclusive experience.
The hotel's snorkeling project is strongly recommended. Compared with summer and winter, the water is slightly muddy, but there are still relatively clear sea water with fish swimming around. Explore in the sea as you like, and the feeling of dancing with fish still beats all the "deep diving experience" packages in Sanya.
Speaking of catering, the lobster barbecue buffet by the sea is not cost-effective based on the variety of dishes, but the excellent products and the sunset view by the sea make me feel that it is worth the money. Although the lobster is not live and grilled, I personally feel that it is killed and steamed at noon and grilled at night. After all, it is impossible for guests to wait too long for self-service. The steak is produced in a cafeteria, the grilling level is stable, and different batches can be perfectly cooked, and the sirloin in the buffet is still full of milk flavor.
Although the family swimming pool is not open, you can see the water slides, the poolside beach, and the water slides cleverly set up in the excellent garden can bring children a wonderful experience of jungle adventure.

msg:This is the seventh Mandarin Oriental that I only remember after Geneva, Lucerne, Beijing, Guangzhou, Shanghai, and Hong Kong Land. The service of Mandarin Oriental will never disappoint. The housekeeper Casey gave full care, and the concierge depar**ent The spa services in the guest room depar**ent, catering depar**ent, and the front desk work are also very efficient. The pool service is warm and thoughtful, but the efficiency of connecting services with the catering depar**ent can be improved (after all, ordering food and drink by the pool should be a common demand), and the services in the recreation depar**ent It was a little bit worse (I went to Kangle to ask what time period is suitable for snorkeling when the tide is high every day. The dull Kangle front desk answered irrelevant questions, and finally told me that this is an uncontrollable natural factor. Finally, I checked the tide level on Baidu. Maybe it‚Äôs because I don‚Äôt need their snorkeling coach service, so I don‚Äôt even want to tell me the time. Snorkeling is the biggest selling point of this hotel. It‚Äôs a big failure if you can‚Äôt do this basic tip well)

This is the hotel with the best snorkeling quality in China that I have stayed in. It is better than Park Hyatt Sunny Bay. There are many colorful fish and live corals on the beach. It is low tide now, so snorkeling can only be done before 10 am every day. By noon the water level was too shallow. Every night and morning, fishermen cast nets outside the hotel beach to catch fish secretly. When snorkeling, you can see many beautiful fish swimming and hitting the net to die.

The rooms are quite big, but not designed, people who are expecting a room may be disappointed. The breakfast is good, but the products of other catering are average. Don't expect too much, but it is understandable that even the chefs of the top Hainan hotels are generally not top-notch.

Generally speaking, this is a top choice among domestic seaside resort hotels (depending on personal needs, I have high requirements for snorkeling, so I will not choose Haitang Bay and Yalong Bay).

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Premier Room - Sea-View (2 beds)
info:Stayed in February 2023
info:Family
info:5 Reviews
rating:1
posted:Posted February 8, 2023
msg:Mandarin Oriental, Sanya claims to be low-key luxury, but I think it is neither low-key nor luxurious. Along the coastline of the hotel is an online celebrity check-in point. It feels like the people who stay in the hotel are all punching in and taking pictures to complete the task. The core of the hotel is considerate and subtle service. The overall service of this hotel is blunt, and there is no feeling of being respected or seen. The geographical location is built on a mountain, so you have to not take a battery car to get out of the room, otherwise you will have to climb the mountain with your legs, resulting in a slow hotel capacity. In short, the photos are beautiful, but the connotation is very empty, which does not meet the positioning of a luxury hotel.

The hotel service issues are as follows:

1. After cleaning the room at night, the housekeeper took away all the used bath towels, but did not put a new towel back. After taking a shower at night, I found that there were no towels in the room.
2. Large garbage bags full of old towels were piled up at the door of the guest room, and no one took them away until the evening.
3. The hotel is built on a mountain. Unless you take a battery car, leaving the room is equivalent to climbing a mountain in the sun, resulting in a slow hotel capacity. It is very slow to call to make an appoin**ent for a battery car and to wait for a battery car.
4. The guest service calls have basically failed since the afternoon, no one answered the phone, and the VX butler can only solve the problem, but the butler also added VX after I asked for it after arriving at the store.
5. The hotel has snorkeled to the beach. The coach requires that children over 6 years old must be accompanied by an adult to snorkel together. No one reminded them during the entire booking process. The brochure in the hotel room shows that the snorkeling price is 180 yuan, and the coach at the beach says 220 yuan. Just don't ask me, you go to the hotel.

The last point that made me feel very uncomfortable is the guest service depar**ent of the hotel. Any additional requests will not be assisted, and the staff's replies are all standard speech, impersonal and direct rejections. In fact, we don't expect the hotel to solve all the difficulties or requests that the guests have. What we hope is to be seen and respected. But the customer service always refused very bluntly, and would just keep repeating, "This is our hotel's policy, and I can't solve it." "I didn't say anything, I didn't say this." Such a reply It makes people feel very uncomfortable, and it feels like the hotel is shirking responsibility up and down. The service depar**ent of the hotel gives me a feeling that if you have any questions, please don't come to me. I am not responsible for anything other than my work.

This is the first time I write a hotel review, I don't know if the hotel manager can read it and draw your attention. Hope to see your progress.

msg:It took me a long time to start writing this review, because I really don't know how to write it?
This trip to Sanya really started from the expectation of Mandarin Oriental, but it also ended from the disappoin**ent of Mandarin Oriental!
A total of four hotels were arranged in Sanya for this trip: Sanya Bay Mangrove Palm Parent-Child Hotel, Westin Haitang Bay, Atlantis Hotel, and Mandarin Oriental. The whole trip started with convenience and was ready to end with a hotel, but Mandarin Oriental disappointed me that it was not as good as mangroves!
First of all, a special thank you. Special thanks to Jing Ran, the PR staff member of Mandarin Oriental, for her service is absolutely in place, responsive and quick to respond! What was particularly touching was that I told her that her daughter's foot was twisted and it hurt a little. She immediately contacted her if there was any medicine in the infirmary. When she learned that there was no medicine in the infirmary, she immediately called the courier to buy medicine and send it to me, and she was resting that day. I am really very, very grateful!
But apart from Jing Ran, the others are not so good. Maybe because of the summer vacation, there were so many people, and it was obvious that the reception of Mandarin Oriental was not enough. 1. I drove to the hotel and parked in the parking lot. There were obviously not enough parking spaces. What was more annoying was that I saw a car go away and then parked in. A staff member came over and said that this is a parking space for charging the battery car. You can't stop, I think you have to figure it out, I stopped when someone else left, others can stop, but I can't? Don't I deserve to be a hotel guest? 2. During the peak check-in period, I finally got in line. The staff left without saying anything. I just continued to wait! 3. The so-called welcome drink in the lobby is also an empty pot. In such a hot day, there is no water during the waiting process. Such a five-star hotel is too bad. 4. The worst battery car service in this process. Tell me that because there are many people, the car has to be called 15 minutes in advance, but even if you call 20 minutes in advance, you can still wait 30 minutes, even if you check out and go to the airport to catch a flight, you will still be asked to wait. They keep saying that we are urging us, but there are several empty cars passing by the door and they will not stop. Even if they stop, they will tell you that you have to wait for arrangements to call for a car, and I cannot pick you up... This is Mandarin Oriental The service was so disappointing. Ms. Tong Yao, the person in charge of the tram service, is not fit to be the person in charge. She has a bad attitude. She also asked me the time of the flight when I checked out to catch the flight. When she learned that the flight time was still early (3 hours before departure), she felt very It doesn't matter, I think it's too early. As a result, I dragged my luggage with a child with a twisted foot, and limply dragged the originally smooth time to the airport to get the boarding pass and almost boarded the plane! 5. The hotel's spa is also offered at random. I bring a 10-year-old child, but he is taller, and he is charged at the adult price. I didn't pursue the fee, because I was happy when I came out, but then another staff member told me that the child was calculated at the child's price. What happened to the previous staff member? Training is a mess! 6. The water in the swimming pool is very dirty. After the child swims, his legs will look like the picture, hey...
Maybe such a hotel is not suitable for peak season! A good low-key luxury five-star hotel, to be honest, the overall service is not as good as the mangrove, I am really disappointed

name:A‚Äçn‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçy‚Äçm‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Superior Room - Garden-View (2 Beds)
info:Stayed in June 2022
info:Friends
info:1 Review
rating:4.7
posted:Posted June 29, 2022
msg:Hainan¬∑Sanya/Sanya Coral Bay Mandarin Oriental Hotel Recommended index‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ+‚òÖ (the environment and service are too good QAQ plus one star)

At the end of June, we finally arranged the long-awaited Mandarin Oriental, a four-hour drive from Meilan Airport to MO, which enjoys a whole sea. The hotel has a strong Southeast Asian style and a lot of green plants. Each room features a spacious terrace and balcony with stunning sunset views that MO is proud of. (But I was probably not able to see it because of fate.) Fortunately, Sanya was still in heavy rain the day before, and the sun was shining on the earth for three days!

There are three open-air swimming pools in the hotel, but no indoor venues. At present, the heated swimming pool does not have a constant temperature due to the hot climate. All three swimming pools are open during the day, and only the infinity swimming pool is open at night. Non-standard swimming lanes, and children like to play in the water in summer, so they did not experience it.

After choosing the most basic Cuiyuan Pavilion with my friends, I jumped two levels to upgrade to Guanhaixuan, which can see the sea. If it is on a sunset day, the view is invincible. The housekeeper will directly connect with the housekeeper the day before check-in, and you can directly feedback the problem with the housekeeper. All the amenities in the room are Oulong, there is no coffee machine in the room, and the MINIBAR in the refrigerator is free to use. Two bottles of 750ML Evian are provided every day. In addition, the call center for drinking water needs to be increased (Nongfu Spring).

Our housekeeper, Nicole, has been attentive to help arrange all kinds of matters since before we checked in. I am really embarrassed to be harassed by me at 11 o'clock in the evening, and sent two super delicious coconut jelly and a little squirrel doll.

Lightning protection point 1: There is no air conditioner in the hotel lobby. It is hot in summer. When customers arrive at the hotel without air conditioning, it will inevitably lead to emotional sensitivity due to the heat. The number of staff is far from meeting the needs of dealing with various problems. Within ten minutes of my check-in, I encountered at least 3 customer complaints. (Staff is very nice, just can't handle the problem at the same time)
Lightning protection point 2: It is still a manpower problem. The hotel is far away from the lobby so that the room type needs a shuttle bus wherever it goes. It takes at least a quarter of an hour or more to wait during peak hours. (Including the need to wait for half an hour or more if ordering take-out needs to be delivered to your door)
Lightning protection point 3: The hotel opened in 2009 and was renovated in 2018, but the bathroom does not have a separate ventilation fan. The bedside charging port in the twin room only has a single bed, and the other side needs to be unplugged (there is no USB straight port). The sound insulation effect is really a bit poor, and the sound of turning over the toilet lid in the middle of the night can be heard, which is harmful.
----------------------------------------

msg:Sunset is the most beautiful time of the day at this beautiful hotel üåÖ

Sanya Mandarin Oriental is not excellent in terms of room hardware, but the garden landscape and public area design are still top-notch in Sanya. Coupled with the meticulous service, it can be said that although there are some shortcomings, it is still the best hotel in Sanya in general. one.

Jing Ran KiKi, the hotel guest relations & itinerary manager, contacted me and added my WeChat before check-in. During the stay, I received very timely feedback and satisfaction. For example, I quit sugar-sweetened beverages and brought sugar-free beverages. Substitute diet drinks in the free mini fridge.

There are many hotels in Sanya with free minibar, but there are only a handful of them that can do this. It seems like a trivial matter, but in fact, it truly realizes the performance of customized services, and also reflects the unity and cooperation between various depar**ents of the hotel.

Many hotels will only bluntly tell me that the drinks in the refrigerator are complete sets and cannot be replaced after I make a request. Really can't? They are just too lazy to coordinate with other depar**ents, and they don't care about the needs of the guests.

In general, Jing Ran KiKi's service made this trip to MO perfect. I originally booked a basic room type, but it was upgraded to Haifeng Pavilion. When I left the store, I also gave the hotel's mascot, the squirrel, which is very good.

Mandarin Oriental exclusively owns Coral Bay, which is an excellent place to watch the sunset. The natural landscape with mountains, sea and sky in the same frame is beautiful.
