1. The geographical location is very private;
2. Has complete resort facilities: independent beach, water activities, travel photography, gym, yoga room, game machine room, etc. Everything is perfect enough to just want to stay in hotels (I am a person who hates hotels, but I am willing to stay in Wenhua~ ~)
3. The scenery is very beautiful, with the most beautiful Cape Pavilion;
4. Haijiao Xuan's buffet is very good. It is a seafood barbecue buffet sitting on the seaside. It realizes the freedom of Xiaoqinglong, durian, and steak... 598 people, need to book in advance;
5. The gym facilities are relatively complete, and there are special fitness classes available;
6. Good service (after all, it is Wenhua~);
7. In the toiletries, the lotion is actually diptyque (cow).
Be
*Deficiencies:
1. The sound insulation of the room is really bad. It was so clear to wash and move the stool next door in the middle of the night that we thought it was right next to us. Difference)
2. The battery car service takes too long to wait. We ordered the car half an hour in advance, and finally it exceeded the reserved time, and it took 4 reminders to come. This point needs to be improved~
3. Regarding the snorkeling included in the room package, when I went there, I didn't explain in advance that I would pay for the coach to take pictures with Gopro. After taking pictures, I told us that it was 180 yuan per person. When I saw the pictures, I was a little nervous Confused, this shot... it's better that I buy a waterproof bag and shoot it myself! It's not worth it~
4. Regarding the travel photography in the room package, it only contains 5 photos, and it is not refined. The cameraman will take 40-50 photos. If you want all of them, just buy the cheapest 699 package, or buy them one by one. , but a personal suggestion, shoot it yourself, the angle cameraman has found it for you, you know~
Be
*Finally, a reminder:
The hotel is located in a military jurisdiction. If you rent a Tesla, you need to park in the parking lot outside the resort, and then ask the front desk to arrange a car pickup. This is not very convenient, because waiting for the car is a problem, and the reimbur*****t of parking fees is a bit troublesome. There is no invoice in the parking lot, you need to ask the customer service to confirm it. In short, to avoid these inconveniences, it is better not to rent a Tesla.
Be
*Summarize:
If you go to Mandarin Oriental, you can actually rent a car for two days less and just stay in a hotel~ You can try the buffet~
----------------------------------------

msg:I chose to go to Sanya for vacation during the Chris**as week. Overall, this hotel is great. This trip is my first time to Sanya. I studied for a long time before choosing a hotel. There are so many hotels to choose from, each with its own merits. After reading the domestic guide and looking at the external Internet, the hotel's ratings were all 4.9‚ûï, so I decisively placed an order to book a room. Because we planned two months in advance, we couldn't consider the weather. As it turned out, the day we arrived was when a typhoon made landfall, and it was almost rainy the whole week. I was still a little disappointed. To be honest, thanks to choosing this hotel, it made up for all the shortcomings caused by the bad weather. The hotel is exquisite and incomparably beautiful, with a Southeast Asian style. There are no small buildings higher than three floors, and the whole hotel has a strong fake style. Although the hospital provides battery car services, we enjoy walking on the beach or in the gardens every day. Although you can't go into the sea, the hotel's heated swimming pool is enough to meet your needs for water play. The hotel has complete facilities, including a rich and varied breakfast buffet, various Chinese and Western restaurants, especially the seafood buffet, which is fresh and delicious. The gym is fully functional. There is also a very high-end spa. This location is super close to the city. We went to the city once and had a coconut chicken. Nothing else was special. It was more comfortable to stay in the hotel. There was a sunny day in the middle and we paddleboarded, which was a lot of fun. It can be said that we have experienced all the food, drinks and entertainment in the hotel. The hotel staff are also super friendly, and they also have a personal butler. In particular, our butler Shona immediately arranged for a coffee machine to be delivered to us on a rainy night, which was very touching. We also chose the hotel package for travel photography. Our photographer, Mr. Sicheng, was also very dedicated and even took photos twice if the weather was bad. All in all everything was perfect, highly recommended. I will try to go again in April, looking forward to ingz

In addition, the quality of the Yiyang‚Äôs set meals is very good, grouper, braised chicken The pieces are delicious; disadvantages: the hotel‚Äôs breakfast needs to be improved, mainly because many of the food produced are very rough, such as the soup in the flour stall. Although there are as many as six kinds, most of them are very sloppy. The quality of the fried dishes in the hotel is basically black; the fried potato shreds used in the pancake stall are also dark, and many breads are close to bake. name:Q‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçf‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçb‚Äçu‚Äçr‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçc‚Äçh‚Äçe‚Äçn
info:Premier Room - Sea-View (Double bed)
info:Stayed in September 2021
info:Couples
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted September 23, 2021
msg:[Boutique Hotel] Before I came, I saw the hotel opened in 2009. I read the reviews and some said that the hotel‚Äôs equipment was old, but I was actually worried. But for mo's reputation, it was booked. I was very pleasantly surprised after I came here. It is fully equipped and well maintained. There are no traces of age on the room furniture, even no traces of bumps. The scenery of the hotel is even more surprising. In the sun, every piece is set off as if it is added. The effect of filters and toning. But this is really a beautiful view taken directly with Apple's native camera. It is the first time for me, a person who has lived by the sea since I was a child, to see that the sea water really has the azure blue on TV. The various ornaments and trees set up on the beach are also very attentive and well organized. The staff are basically friendly and polite. Special thanks to our housekeeper Valentina Liao Xiaohui, her voice is so good, she helped us check in at 12 o'clock early and helped us check out until 2 o'clock. Only the urc group can compare the service. Compared with Conrad, pheromones, jw Marriott is really not the same level of service. At the front desk, there is a small refrigerator in the waiting area filled with drinks for free for guests. Although it is not a lot of money, there are several hotels that have this attitude. Although the price of the hotel is not cheap but I think it is worth it. It is a very suitable place for vacation. You can already enjoy the best side of Sanya in the hotel for three days.
After boasting, let me talk about a few points that I feel are insufficient.
1. The seaside buffet has a beautiful view. It is very dreamy to watch the sunset accompanied by the sound of the waves. But time is a bit awkward. The opening time is 6:30 when the sunset is the most beautiful, but they are bitterly queuing for the meal. It is suggested that you can arrange the start time flexibly according to the sunset time. In addition, the barbecue booth is too smokey but there seems to be no solution. The taste is really very general. It can only be said that the scenery is worth the price.
2. The beach chair cushion is wet after the rain and there is no solution. It is a bit embarrassing after the showers clear up. This can actually be solved.
3. The ground of the hotel itself has a certain height to the beach. The sand is mixed with coral stones and it is not easy to walk. If you can set up some steps to the beach, it will be more attentive.
Thanks again to Miss Liao Xiaohui for her attentive service. Next time I have a trip to Sanya, I will choose Mandarin Oriental again

msg:In 2014, when the child was one year old, it was the first time to stay in Cultural Oriental. The experience was very good. A set of sand dredging toys was given as a gift. Every employee I met would greet them from the heart. They are very enthusiastic and motivated. Among the picky, my husband caught a cold and the employee ran out to help buy medicine. Therefore, after 7 years, we chose Wenhua again, and we were quite disappointed with the service. We started before we checked in. After reading the evaluation, the housekeeper would contact us in advance. But we didn‚Äôt wait and booked Haijiao Xuan restaurant. I took the initiative to call to make an appoin**ent. The housekeeper was added after I requested it. After adding, I didn‚Äôt take the initiative to contact, and I often couldn‚Äôt respond to the questions I asked. After I checked in, I found that the employees were not as active as before. Enthusiasm, of course, I also understand that there is a high probability that the summer vacation will not be too busy. It may be better than most other hotels, but it is not comparable to the previous Mandarin, and the breakfast is not as exquisite as before, although the variety of Chinese food is now increasing. Also, sand dredging toys are no longer given away, they are sold instead. But there are also surprises. The landscape in the hotel is still very beautiful. When you walk to the fragrance of plumeria, the beach and the sea are much better than before, and a lot of online celebrity check-in points have been added, which is very suitable for taking pictures! The quality of the travel shots I sent was also quite high, and later I added money to buy all the negatives. Regarding the restaurant, I personally do not recommend the seafood buffet! The price/performance ratio is too low. Although the lobsters are not limited, they are all frozen and worthless. The steaks are also very ordinary and there are too many people. Anyway, I was disappointed after trying it once. What's even more regrettable is that we had originally booked the Haijiao Xuan for two nights, but in the event of a small typhoon, the outdoor dining was cancelled and changed to indoor. Without the sea view, there would be no soul, so we cancelled it. However, the hotel‚Äôs Yiyang restaurant is highly recommended! We ate three meals without stepping on thunder. The coconut rice and coconut jelly were very delicious.
